channel.title: Someone who is good with this kinda stuff... help? :)
channel.description:
ok, i was trying to figure out how they calculate the max hit on a private server... i found the fighting type agressave... this is what i get
MaxHit += (double)(1.35 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00525))
im guessing thats how you calculate the max hit on a private server... but i dont get how to do it, anyone wanna help?

item.title: Someone who is good with this kinda stuff... help? :)

@hat_trix wrote:

ohhhh sooo how would i solve this? anyone have a clue?

item.title: Someone who is good with this kinda stuff... help? :)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Just a bunch of math…(double) is just letting the server know it’s a double (doubles are used for decimals)

Read full topic
